publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4293 Shirley-Anne Somerville: Edinburgh Diversity Cup—That the Parliament welcomes the Edinburgh Diversity Cup five-a-side football tournament on Saturday 20 June 2009; notes that this will be the third annual cup hosted by the Edinburgh Inter-Faith Association; recognises that the tournament’s aims are to celebrate the diversity of the city’s population and bring more people together through sport; further notes that all the money raised from the event will go to the Hope into Homes charity, which will be building much-needed houses in Malawi in August 2009, and urges teams to visit www.diversitycup.com and enter the competition, have fun and support a worthy cause.
S3M-4293 Edinburgh Diversity Cup (lodged on 2 June 2009) Hugh Henry*, Rob Gibson*, Alasdair Allan*, Stuart McMillan*, Kenneth Gibson*, Jamie Hepburn*, Liam McArthur*, Robin Harper*
S3M-4293 Edinburgh Diversity Cup (lodged on 2 June 2009) Christina McKelvie*, Bob Doris*

S3M-4293 Shirley-Anne Somerville: Edinburgh Diversity Cup—That the Parliament welcomes the Edinburgh Diversity Cup five-a-side football tournament on Saturday 20 June 2009; notes that this will be the third annual cup hosted by the Edinburgh Inter-Faith Association; recognises that the tournament’s aims are to celebrate the diversity of the city’s population and bring more people together through sport; further notes that all the money raised from the event will go to the Hope into Homes charity, which will be building much-needed houses in Malawi in August 2009, and urges teams to visit www.diversitycup.com and enter the competition, have fun and support a worthy cause. Supported by: Hugh Henry, Rob Gibson, Alasdair Allan, Stuart McMillan, Kenneth Gibson, Jamie Hepburn, Liam McArthur, Robin Harper, Christina McKelvie, Bob Doris, Jack McConnell*
S3M-4293 Edinburgh Diversity Cup (lodged on 2 June 2009) Gil Paterson*
S3M-4293 Edinburgh Diversity Cup (lodged on 2 June 2009) Bill Kidd*
